text.div:
GoalStatusReason

Example codes indicating the reason for a current status. Note that these are in no way complete and may not even be appropriate for some uses.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/goal-status-reason

name: GoalStatusReason
description: Example codes indicating the reason for a current status.  Note that these are in no way complete and may not even be appropriate for some uses.
